scripts.compile: npm run compile-server & npm run compile-client
scripts.dist: npm run dist-linux & npm run dist-win
scripts.pack: npm run pack-client & npm run pack-styles
scripts.update: npm run compile && npm run pack && npm run dist
scripts.update-patch-dev-alpha: node update.js patch -d a && npm run update
scripts.update-patch-dev-beta: node update.js patch -d b && npm run update
scripts.update-patch-dev: node update.js patch -d b && npm run update
scripts.update-patch-prod-alpha: node update.js patch -p a && npm run update
scripts.update-patch-prod-beta: node update.js patch -p b && npm run update
scripts.update-patch-prod: node update.js patch -p b && npm run update
scripts.update-minor-dev-alpha: node update.js minor -d a && npm run update
scripts.update-minor-dev-beta: node update.js minor -d b && npm run update
scripts.update-minor-dev: node update.js minor -d b && npm run update
scripts.update-minor-prod-alpha: node update.js minor -p a && npm run update
scripts.update-minor-prod-beta: node update.js minor -p b && npm run update
scripts.update-minor-prod: node update.js minor -p b && npm run update
scripts.update-major-dev-alpha: node update.js major -d a && npm run update
scripts.update-major-dev-beta: node update.js major -d b && npm run update
scripts.update-major-dev: node update.js major -d b && npm run update
scripts.update-major-prod-alpha: node update.js major -p a && npm run update
scripts.update-major-prod-beta: node update.js major -p b && npm run update
scripts.update-major-prod: node update.js major -p b && npm run update
